attributes.action: Strict guidelines for 101 gosport rd, homeless shelter and antisocial behaviour
attributes.background:
Strict guidelines for 101 gosport rd, fareham homeless shelter, and get help for the people that actually need it and don't abuse the system 
This petition is with regards to the local issues caused by the poor management of the Two Saints or 101 homeles

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you have raised. Guidelines for the shelter would be the responsibility of the local council.

You could raise the issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:
http://www.fareham.gov.uk/have_your_say/petitions/intro.aspx

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
